subject: IME Request - Psychiatric Evaluation - Case WC-2025-4432
body:
Good afternoon,

We are requesting a psychiatric Independent Medical Examination for the following claimant:

Patient Name: Sarah Martinez
Date of Birth: 08/22/1985
Case Number: WC-2025-4432
Type of Examination: Psychiatric IME
Preferred Date: April 10, 2025
Preferred Time: 1:00 PM
Location: San Francisco, CA

Referring Organization: Pacific Insurance Group
Contact Person: Jennifer Adams, Claims Adjuster
Contact Email: claims@pacificinsurance.com
Report Due Date: April 24, 2025

The claimant has been experiencing anxiety and depression following a workplace incident. Please find attached medical records and the employer's incident report.

Please confirm availability at your earliest convenience.

Best regards,
Jennifer Adams
Pacific Insurance Group

attachments.text_content: Psychiatric evaluation records for Sarah Martinez. Patient reports severe anxiety and panic attacks following workplace incident on January 10, 2025. Symptoms include difficulty sleeping, intrusive thoughts, avoidance behaviors, and difficulty concentrating. Previous psychiatric history: treated for mild depression in 2020. Current medications: Sertraline 50mg daily. Patient has attended 6 therapy sessions with limited improvement. Psychiatrist recommends continued treatment and possible medication adjustment.

Incident Report: On January 10, 2025, employee Sarah Martinez witnessed a serious workplace accident involving heavy machinery. Employee reported immediate emotional distress and was sent home. Follow-up indicated development of post-traumatic stress symptoms. Employee has been on modified duty since January 15, 2025. Request for psychiatric evaluation to determine work capacity and treatment needs.
